summary: This is a retexture for the Argonian female, it will make your Argonian looks more feminine.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078-0-1477969275.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=4][font=Courier New]Please read the [color=#ff0000]sticky posts[/color] for extra information[/font][/size][/center]
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078-1-1460979536.png[/img][/center][font=Courier New][size=3][i]
[/i][center][i]Ever seen a sexy reptile walking on two legs?, now you will!!, this mod will make your walking reptile looks sexier than before, Feminine Argonian comes with two main variations (Chameleon and Lizard), including 5 options each:

[i][color=#ffe599][b]- Abs:[/b][/color] An athletic argonian is better than a normal one especially when climbing rocks.
[i][i][color=#ffe599][b]- No Scales:[/b][/color] When your humanoid genes are stronger nothing can stop the smooth belly you got!
[i][i][color=#ffe599][b]- Less Scales:[/b][/color] Sometimes less is more! or maybe not! who cares? just enjoy your scales.[/i][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i]
[i][b][color=#ffe599]- More Scales[/color][color=#ead1dc]:[/color][/b] More protection to your chest, Now you can take more bullets.. I mean arrows!
[i][i][color=#ffe599][b]- Full Scales:[/b][/color] You got a scaly chest, when your mutation drives you away from your humanoid ancestors![/i][/i][/i][/center][i]
[/i][/size][/font]
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078-2-1460979536.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]-6CppUMppbQ[/youtube] [youtube]onIJpKDcKus[/youtube] [youtube]OS0Rp2ETDvI[/youtube] [youtube]01VLD5lI78Q[/youtube] [/center]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078-3-1460979536.png[/img][/center]
[center][i][font=Courier New][size=3]- Install normally via NMM.
- If installing manually, [i][font=Courier New][size=3]pick either Chameleon or Lizard then pick one of chest options, then [/size][/font][/i]you need to place "Textures" folder inside "Data" folder,  replace files if prompt, [color=#ff0000](don't forget to backup your original files).
[/color][/size][/font][/i]
[i][font=Courier New][size=3]- CBBE Version: CBBE body is required for using my CBBE textures.
 [url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-
[/url][/size][/font][/i][i]
[i][font=Courier New][size=3]- UNP Version: UNP body is required for using my UNP textures.[/size][/font][/i]
[font=Courier New][size=3] [url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body
[/url]
[i][font=Courier New][size=3]- Vanilla Version: This doesn't require anything, you're good to go.[/size][/font][/i][/size][/font][/i][/center][i]
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078-4-1460979536.png[/img][/center]
[/i][center][font=Courier New][size=3][i]- This mod is compatible with all mods as long as using CBBE body with my CBBE textures or UNP body with my UNP textures.
- CBBE version, this is compatible with CHSBHC and HDT.
- UNP version, this is compatible with UNPB and 7b.
[/i][/size][/font][font=Courier New][size=3][i]- Using other Argonian head textures will make the character looks awkward, head's color is going to be different than body's color.[/i][/size][/font][/center]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078-5-1460979536.png[/img][/center][size=3][font=Courier New][i]
[center]- [url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686]Caliente[/url] (Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-).
- [url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675]dimon99[/url] (DIMONIZED UNP female body).
- [url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3136685]SvarogNL[/url] (Fitness Body).
- [url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/322108]AnTiWoMaAgNoT[/url] (Human Argonian Khajiit Texture).
- [url=https://bethesda.net/]Bethesda[/url] (Skyrim).[/center][/i][/font][/size]

[b][size=6][center]My Other Mods:[/center]
[center][url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62193][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078/75078-1512948820-1747471873.png[/img][/url][url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62574][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078/75078-1512948813-1184267859.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70481][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078/75078-1512948833-1351008596.png[/img][/url][url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70164][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75078/75078-1512948826-1190818860.png[/img][/url][/center][/size][/b]

[center][font=Courier New][size=3][i]Thanks for Hot file!![/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/62574-1-1423806371.jpg[/img][/center]
author: MONSTERaider

files.name: Feminine Argonian Textures (Chameleon and Lizard) CBBE
files.fileName: Feminine Argonian Textures (Chameleon and Lizard) CBBE-62574-2-0.7z
files.changelogHtml:
- Added Vanilla body support
- Total rework on the textures
- Lots of seam fixes
- Now 4K is available (However no more support for 1K)
- New chest variations: No Scales, Full Scales and renamed "Bare Chest" to "Less Scales"
- Optimized files compression and sizes
- Included resolution packs in one installation
- Edited NMM installation script to add the new changes
